title: More efficient logic needed for processing disk sorting with border values
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Sort 40000 row data on disk. 
2. Set the program to process the data less than 40000 rows. 
3. The program should: 
   a. Save the file as a temporary file. 
   b. Load the file into memory. 
   c. Sort the data. 
   d. Save the sorted data to a temporary file.
